snippet: The annual festival, held in Indio, Calif., will feature two weekends, April 13-15 and April 20-22, with the Black Keys, Radiohead, Snoop Dogg, Dr. Dre and more.
abstract: The annual festival, held in Indio, Calif., will feature two weekends, April 13-15 and April 20-22, with the Black Keys, Radiohead, Snoop Dogg, Dr. Dre and more.
lead_paragraph: The Black Keys, Radiohead, Snoop Dogg and Dr. Dre will headline the Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival in April, according to the event's Twitter page.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival
